official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit against income tax for caregivers of individuals with long-term care needs.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for caregivers of individuals with long-term care needs in an amount equal to $1,200 for each such individual with respect to whom the taxpayer is an eligible caregiver for the taxable year.
